languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} replaces {uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} with the same number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} until the end of combat.
While the Executioner has temporary wounds, all of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} and damage-over-time effects deal an additional +{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Executioner trades {uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} wounds for the same amount of temporary wounds until the end of combat.
While Executioner has temporary hit points, all his melee attacks and DoTs deal additional damage, equal to {uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}%.

The Executioner replaces {uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} with the same number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} until the end of combat.
While the Executioner has temporary wounds, all their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} and damage-over-time effects deal an additional +{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

The Executioner replaces {uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} with the same number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} until the end of combat.
While the Executioner has temporary wounds, all their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} and damage-over-time effects deal an additional +{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

The Executioner replaces {uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} with the same number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} until the end of combat.
While the Executioner has temporary wounds, all of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} and damage-over-time effects deal an additional +{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} replaces {uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} with the same number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} until the end of combat.
While the Executioner has temporary wounds, all of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} and damage-over-time effects deal an additional +{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} reemplaza{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} con el mismo número de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} hasta el final del combate.
Mientras el ejecutor tiene heridas temporales, todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} y efectos de daño continuado infligen +{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} replaces {uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} with the same number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} reemplaza{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} con el mismo número de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} hasta el final del combate.
Mientras el ejecutor tiene heridas temporales, todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} y efectos de daño continuado infligen +{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}は、戦闘が終了するまで、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}のうち{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}を、同数の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}に置き換える。
エクスキューショナーが一時体力を持っている間、彼らの{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}と継続ダメージ効果はすべて、追加で+{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} replaces {uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} with the same number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} until the end of combat.
While the Executioner has temporary wounds, all of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} and damage-over-time effects deal an additional +{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}は、戦闘が終了するまで、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}のうち{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}を、同数の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}に置き換える。
エクスキューショナーが一時体力を持っている間、彼らの{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}と継続ダメージ効果はすべて、追加で+{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}将{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}替换为数量相同的{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。
只要行刑者拥有临时生命值，行刑者所有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}与持续伤害效果造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}就会提高{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}%。

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} replaces {uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} with the same number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} until the end of combat.
While the Executioner has temporary wounds, all of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} and damage-over-time effects deal an additional +{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}将{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}替换为数量相同的{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。
只要行刑者拥有临时生命值，行刑者所有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}与持续伤害效果造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}就会提高{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}%。

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} ersetzt {uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} seiner {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes mit derselben Anzahl {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporärer Wunden{/g}.
Hat der Henker temporäre Wunden, verursachen alle seine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} und Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte zusätzlich +{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} replaces {uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} with the same number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} until the end of combat.
While the Executioner has temporary wounds, all of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} and damage-over-time effects deal an additional +{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} ersetzt {uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} seiner {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes mit derselben Anzahl {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporärer Wunden{/g}.
Hat der Henker temporäre Wunden, verursachen alle seine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} und Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte zusätzlich +{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.

languages.text:
L'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} remplace {uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} de ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} par l'équivalent en {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
Tant que l'exécuteur a des blessures temporaires, ses {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} et effets de dégâts progressifs infligent +{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} replaces {uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} with the same number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} until the end of combat.
While the Executioner has temporary wounds, all of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} and damage-over-time effects deal an additional +{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
L'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} remplace {uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} de ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} par l'équivalent en {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
Tant que l'exécuteur a des blessures temporaires, ses {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} et effets de dégâts progressifs infligent +{uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Палач{/g} заменяет {uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} на такое же количество {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} до конца боя.
Пока у палача есть временное здоровье, его атаки в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} и эффекты периодического урона наносят на {uip|Damage|497d9f67e4b14631805c05dcb66bdcbf}% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
